description: Sin descripción

name: Racing Go
description: Sin descripción

name: Sword Chronicles: Awaken
description: An mobile RPG of another story using the famous individuals from the Three Kingdoms era.

name: Strangers Awaken
description: Sin descripción

name: Beat the Beat!
description: Sin descripción

name: Merge War: Super Legion Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Horror Ken
description:
High difficulty horror action game
Game commentary OK！

name: Gnostic: Survivors
description: Gnostic: Survivors is a survivor style 3rd person co-op game where you pick your weapon, level up to unlock legendary upgrades and survive the never ending horde of enemies.

name: Mix Superstar
description: Sin descripción

name: My Nonogram Waifu: Forbidden Love
description: Sin descripción

name: Mojito the Cat: Platina Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: 2048 Game With New Levels
description: Merge two numbers to go to next level and merge again to go to next highest level and the target will be 2048 and also you can change the target by going to settings.

name: Profiler: The Hopscotch Killer - Extended Edition
description:
Examine the crime scenes, find clues and discover the serial killer identity. Will you be able to find him on time?
Miss Smith will soon be replacing Deckard, a police officer who is retiring. He will still be here a few days, to show her the ropes. And they won’t be resting: several cases are waiting for them. Obviously, it is more about murders than accidents or suicides… The murderer seems to be following a precise pattern… Miss Black and Deckard will have to investigate to discover who the serial killer is and prevent him from killing someone else.
Help them investigating and observe carefully the crime scenes: time is against you!

name: Two Neons One Brain
description:
Human can't do two things at the same time.
Can you control two flappy neons at the same time?
But, you have only one brain.
Tap the left part of the phone to control the left flappy neon.
Tap the right part of the phone to control the right flappy neon.
The obstacles are changing every time.

name: Tomb Slider
description:
Escape dozens of ancient tombs in this brain-busting puzzle game! Clear the path between the hero and the exit with a few swipes of your finger and enjoy eye-popping artwork that jumps off your mobile screen.
Using your keen intellect to figure out how to move the rocks that block the exit, help an Incan warrior escape hundreds of cleverly designed levels on his quest to reach the surface. The journey might not be easy, but it will be supremely satisfying! Whether you enjoy mind-melting challenges or an easy, breezy experience, Tomb Slider will provide hours of fun and addictive gameplay, so start the adventure today!

name: Squarez: Escape The Squares
description: Don’t touch a square. Click around your screen and the ball will move.

name: Swing 2 Heli
description:
Tap to change direction and swing the 2 heli,don't touch metal pieces.
Play with your friend at the same time on the same device!
Sick and tired of not being able to play swing helicopter with your friends at the exact same time on the same device? Then worry no more !

name: Just Touch The WhiteBox!!!
description:
You Don't Know This is Easy Before Playing.
Just Try! and Just Touch The WhiteBox!!

name: TapTapBadger
description:
Be a Hero! use the unique powers of your fingers to tap away the mean badgers and save the world from the evil psy-Badgerinator!
Grow precise reflexes and powerful concentration skills like no others and prove it to all on the leaderboards.

name: Peace Park
description: Peace Park - the game that challenges players to restore peace in a communal park, by understanding visitors' interests and making wise decisions

name: Finger Maniac
description:
How fast are your fingers?? Just how fast can you type the alphabet?

Over 40 levels of finger typing fun! Can you type out all the words within the given time? Watch out as the words get tougher and longer as you move up the levels! Again, be accurate!!

name: Bulu Monster
description:
Monsters are the main theme of the exciting new app from Sigma Game. Bulu Monster allows the user to become a monster trainer on Bulu Island. Sigma Game believes this app will stand out from all of the other monster games on the market as Bulu Monster puts the user fully in control. In this role playing adventure game, the user must discover, capture, fight and train one of the 150 monsters. Bulu Monster also allows the user to engage with friends and with other trainers online, enabling them to challenge their friends and other players of the game.
Bulu Monster was some eighteen months in the making; Sigma Game has ensured that the app is of the quality that users will have come to expect. The high quality animation, adventurous storyline, and the ability to challenge both friends and other users online adds to the exhilarating, high energy feel of this game.
Bulu Monster leads the user on a unique adventure that is not available on other monster games. As well as enabling the user to capture monsters, the user can train them, too, and this is what makes Bulu Monster different to the other games that can be found out there.
For ease of play, Bulu Monster has a one-hand touch control so no joystick is required, and it allows the user to be able to create the right balance between control and game playing. Another feature of Bulu Monster is the online shop. The shop allows users of Bulu Monster to access special purchase items and discounts as well as reading feedback from on other users and engaging with other competitors on the online forum.

name: Tumble Wrestling
description:
Tumble Wrestling is a casual physics based fighting game that challenges you to knock your opponent out of the ring.
There is a variety of wrestlers to chose from, each with a pro wrestling signature move that can be used to weaken or KO your opponent. Use power slams, irish whips, elbow drops, atomic drops, pile drivers and moves off the ropes to earn that win!
Early challengers will start out easy, but will become increasingly difficult as you fight your way to a title bout. As the game becomes more difficult, you must decide whether to go for the raw power ring out, or methodically pound your foe into into a daze and then go for the ring out. Let the mayhem begin!

This game was created especially for math junkies. The goal is quite simple: You need to calculate a number that is located at the center of the screen. To receive maximum points you have to calculate absolutely all numbers on the level. If you able to do it on the all 37 levels – you will receive 814 points and damn you are really good in math!

name: Business Superstar Idle Tycoon
description:
Do you love money? Want to be rich and become a business superstar? Sure you do!
Play now as an entrepreneur, use strategy and manage your business in the most creative way possible to grow your corporate empire. Get rich from zero to hero!
Business Superstar is a business simulation game all about money, prestige and glory.

name: Picket Fences
description:
Can you trump the neighbors? Compete with the neighbors for the highest score in a series of zany home-themed rummy card games.
Achieve 'Full House' for a big bonus, or shoot for the risky, but rewarding high-end sets. Use bonus cards to make special plays against your opponents or gain additional points. Earn medals, awards, and badges as you advance through the card games.

name: TwisTouch
description: Take every fire with its color but use one different finger for each fire! Totally crazy idea that give you fun and make you think too.

name: Discordia by Iron Games
description: In 'Discordia', you develop your city by building farms, barracks, defenses, harbors, and markets, and by trading with ships. Use your seamen, soldiers, merchants, and farmers profitably, fulfill decrees, and secure privileges — acting carefully at all times so that your city grows neither too fast nor too slow. Will you have the best-developed city at the end of the fourth year and score many points, or will you manage to impress the empress before then and win the game early?

name: Merge Circle
description: Merge Circle is an addictive and visually stunning hypercasual puzzle game that will captivate your mind and test your reflexes. Immerse yourself in a world of vibrant colors and nature vibes as you embark on a challenging journey to merge units and solve intricate puzzles.

name: Rolling Down Bottles
description:
Ready for an exhilarating hyper-casual challenge? Test your skills as you guide the bottle down stairs, avoiding obstacles and daring jumps. It's a hilarious, addictive adventure that'll keep you hooked!
Unlock a variety of cool bottles with unique styles and personalities. Tap to play, conquer levels, and beat your high score in this fun-filled game. Download now and roll like never before!

name: Survival Bowling
description:
Welcome to the definitive mashup of bowling and horde survival. In Survival Bowling, you use a limited supply of bowling balls to defeat waves of bowling pins. In each wave you will complete a typical game of ten-pin bowling. Typical, that is, except for the fact that the pins are coming to snatch up all your balls!
The pins are alive. They have arms, legs, and cruel intentions. They will advance down the lane towards your stash of bowling balls. If they make it all the way, they will steal a bunch and try to carry them back to the pit. But if you act fast, you can bowl them over as they retreat and get the balls back!
The game progresses as a series of waves with increasing difficulty. As you advance you will have more lanes to manage, the pins will get quicker, and they may start surprising you with some dirty tricks! At the end of each wave, you will receive reward balls for each spare, strike, and turkey you achieved. You will need to do well to earn enough balls to make it through the next wave. If you run out of balls, you will see the Game Over screen. You may use up to 3 continues to keep going, after which the game is truly over.

name: Gorathar
description:
Embark on an adventure like no other with Gorathar, an innovative rogue-like deckbuilder game that combines engaging gameplay and an optional fitness integration.

Step into the shoes of Hoodin, an intrepid explorer and scientist who dives into a magical cave system - the only place in the world where magic exists. Your goal? To explore, challenge the cave's mysteries, and see how far you can progress without meeting your end.

In Gorathar, strategy is key. With a starting deck of action cards, every card you play is a step closer to defeating the cave's denizens and uncovering its secrets. After each successful encounter, reap rewards to enhance your gameplay and further your journey.

name: Zombie Mutant Run
description:
Download this cute and fun blue zombie mutant running game!
Fun for all ages and great way to past the time. Help the blue monster avoid obstacles and see how far you can help him go without falling. Simple to play yet hard to master.

name: Road Drawing 3D
description: Road Drawing 3D is an addicting draw-to-move type of game. In order to move the ball, you have to draw. When release your finger, the ball will start moving accordingly to the drawn path. Extremely intuitive gameplay mechanic. Do your best to draw at the right direction so the ball does not bump into moving obstacles, walls, rotating objects, etc.

name: Truck Simulator Pro USA
description: Experience the ultimate trucking adventure with Truck Simulator Pro USA! Immerse yourself in the world of American trucking as you explore vast highways and breathtaking landscapes across the United States. Transport goods, take on challenging missions, and build your own trucking empire.

name: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2024
description: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2023=4 puts you in the role of head coach for your favorite college football team. Recruit, gameplan and make the right calls on the field to lead your team to the top of the ranks and the college football championship.

name: NERF Legends: Elite Blaster Combo Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: The Queen's Quest
description: “The Queen's Quest” is a fantasy point-and-click adventure game and Yuri dating sim. Play as Elysia Fernwhisper as she goes on an epic quest for Queen Drusilla that takes her across her vast and majestic kingdom. Along the way she will meet many beautiful women and may even fall in love!

name: Internet Cafe Creator
description: Internet Cafe Creator is a new type of gameplay in the internet cafe game series. Build, expand, buy computers, hire staff, fight off bandits - all this wait you in this great game!

name: Book of Hours: Perpetual Edition DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Lust Element: Season 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Aevitas
description: Aevitas is a digital world where you hold the key to its creation and ownership.

name: The Lost Glitches
description: The Lost Glitches is a Techno-Optimist set Trading Card Game with RPG progression. Head-to-head PvP battles require strategy, unique deck construction and clever wits to climb the ladder.

name: Pet Mania
description: A pet simulator for social networks.

name: Segredos do Mar
description: Sin descripción

name: Vila Mágica
description: Sin descripción

name: MegaCity
description: A city administration simulator which was popular in Brazil.

name: Darkness Road
description:
Darkness Road is an immersive survival horror and psychological horror game that will plunge players into a chilling and nightmarish experience. Set in the year 1996, within the foreboding town of Dar Al Hai located in the Arabian Gulf, this game offers a unique blend of suspenseful gameplay and captivating storytelling.

Playing from a third-person perspective, you assume the role of Hamdan, an ordinary 34-year-old resident of Dar Al Hai. Suddenly and inexplicably abducted, Hamdan finds himself trapped within a cursed place. With every ounce of his being, he strives to escape the clutches of this malevolent force, only to discover that his efforts seem to lead him deeper into the darkness.

name: EyeToy: Chat
description:
You've probably experienced it before: you come to a party and you wear exactly the same clothes as a friend. Another thing: your relatives are busy on the phone, just like you urgently need to call your buddy. Or you want to chat and play a game of chess, but you can't find anyone to play with. These (and many more) annoying situations are now a thing of the past. Thanks to EyeToy: Chat, a videophone application for the PS2 that lets you talk to friends and other EyeToy: Chat owners while looking them in the eye.

All you need is a PS2, a network adapter (Ethernet) (for PlayStation(R)2), a broadband connection, an EyeToy (with a built-in microphone) and a copy of EyeToy: Chat. After that, all you have to do is find other Chat users and start chatting.

name: Blue Boy Adventure
description: Blue Boy Adventure is a short, old-school 2D action RPG. You are Blue Boy, an aspiring adventurer who comes to an island to find a legendary treasure.

name: Labyrinth
description:
Besides the classic square mazes, there are many original circular and triangular mazes to discover.

There are also some special maze shapes like rabbit, guitar or tree mazes. Have fun searching for the exit through this fascinating puzzle experience.

Challenge yourself with a journey through a constellation of mazes that can be played in 7 different game modes, including our unique twisted mazes with teleportation portals.

name: Brutal Complex
description:
One summer day, a girl realizes the way to the dream world, a path of blood leading to a white space. What kind of world awaits beyond that? Brutal Complex has a cute, surreal, and aesthetic atmosphere.

As of July 22, 2024, the title has been put on indefinite hiatus.

name: Tastes Like Coffee
description: It's a late night and there's not a soul in sight... Until one lone customer walks into your coffee shop. Make drinks, lend an ear, and maybe even make a friend.

name: Sweeter Yesterday
description:
You play as a young girl named Laletta, and go on a reminiscent adventure throughout her childhood world, coming across her imaginary friends along the way. Laletta's friends all have aspects of her personality intertwined in them, so when they start to become selfish and insincere, or vain and narcissistic... Laletta wonders if these bad traits are present in herself, too?

Follow Laletta on her journey of love, fear, and self-introspection.

name: Dumpster Date
description: Time to grab some limbs and play human for your upcoming date!

name: Ikaruga Snake
description: Snake game with Ikaruga scoring rules for Playdate console

name: Book of Hours: Perpetual Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cloud Jump
description: Take to the clouds in this singleplayer 3D precision platformer! Jump over obstacles and navigate moving platforms as you make your way through the sky.

name: Dendam
description: Dendam is a game of hide and seek, you can fight and will be given weapons but can only load 1 bullet, besides that there will be ghosts that bother you, some puzzles to complete the task.

name: Home trip
description: This is an adventure casual game where you will play the role of collecting materials and experiencing the natural scenery.

name: Crescite
description: Cropout is a casual top-down strategy game with stylized graphics. Each new game is a unique procedurally generated island with resources on it. To complete the game, buy a mysterious artifact.

name: Rocket Power: Zero Gravity Zone
description:
A console port for Rocket Power: Zero Gravity Zone was in development alongside the Game Boy Advance version of the game, however was cancelled before release after THQ cut funding for the game.

The engine for the game was later reused in the cancelled game Sonic the Hedgehog Extreme.

name: RubyDung
description: RubyDung was an unreleased strategy sandbox game created by Markus "Notch" Persson before Minecraft.

name: The Immortal Mayor: Kingdom of Women
description: As the deity of the Kingdom of Women (yes, there will only be females in this world), you will lead the villagers to develop and grow stronger. The villagers of the Kingdom of Women have higher abilities and more needs.

name: Squirrel vs. Worms
description: The life of a squirrel is simple. Constant fun in the park ending in nut feast, but only untill the worms invasion occur. The vicious worms want to deprive the squirrel of its food. Help the squirrel in its struggle with its eternal enemies - worms. Defend squirrel against hordes of worms trying to take possesion of its supplies. Check how your friends managed in this battle.

name: The Catch!
description:
Slide, run, jump and claw your way through the marvelous world of The Catch!
Each day is a new pursuit as the environment develops around you.
In this colorful world, Grandma, the dog and a couple of nasty crows are all out to get you! Take to the streets as a fat cat with stolen sausages. Test your reflexes as you zip across rooftops, tippy-toe over power lines and dash along ledges.
Swipe to turn, slide and jump to avoid danger while earning coins, special bonuses and power-ups. Challenge and beat your Facebook friends’ high score and become the top cat!

name: Mr White
description:
Featured on AppAdvice.com as part of the Endless Running App Guide!!
Simply keep flying!
Gain your high score by collecting circles and unlocking power-ups!

name: Space Command Battleship
description:
The universe is unfair. First Earth and now exoplanet Earth 2 is facing the same cosmic injustice...but You can stop this! Your SpaceCom battleship is in position, the weapons are ready to fire and the asteroids are incoming - Failure is not an option!

The derelict sound of space couldn’t hide the destruction of Earth. A war of rock that spelled the end of humanity as we knew it - everybody was dead and the few survivors waited to be rescued... rescue never came. That was 900 years ago now, the survivors that were left took refuge aboard the mighty SpaceCom One battleship - and over many generations they learn to control the spaceship and left the broken galaxy that we once called home...
After 100 years of travelling through the vast and dark wilderness of the Universe: they came across Porous-Rift, a galaxy populated by exoplanets they may one day call home again. However, history came back to haunt the crew of SpaceCom One... the Asteroid Belt of Porous-Rift had ruptured, causing thousands of mighty asteroids to rip the only chance that humanity would have of repopulating. Humanity wasn’t ready then... so they must be ready now.

name: Fizzy Factory
description:
Step into the soda factory to play the most addictive puzzle game on the market.
You are faced with the tasty task of transporting soda from our naturally flowing soda geysers to color-coded soda bottles. The gameplay is simple. Just drag your finger to move soda around the board. Red soda goes in the red bottle. Easy enough, right?
Sure. At least until you have to mix the blue and yellow soda to fill the green bottle.
This factory is outfitted with the latest in soda making technology. Slide that blue soda through the red Color Station, and we’ve got purple soda! We can even run that orange soda through a Splitter for more red and yellow soda!

name: Switch Dash Game
description: Tap To Screen For Switch Color Dash. Go to the top, become the leader of the world ranking!

name: 60 Second Game Challenge
description:
How long can you play this game?
One-button-action at its finest.

name: Kodama
description:
What kind of tree is this? A Kodama tree?! Here's a game of voice changing and creature collecting! You've found a rare Bonsai, where cute and mysterious voice spirits called "Kodama" come to play! These spirits love to play tag and hide & seek!
Once you find one hiding around your Bonsai, it's time to play tag!
If you can catch it before it escapes, it'll become your friend!
Talk to one of the Kodama you've befriended, and it'll echo your words back to you!
They echo your words in many ways, such as high-pitched, with added bleeps, backwards, or fast-forwarded! Each Kodama has a different echo, so make friends with them all and see what you can find!
Plus, if you make friends with enough Kodama, you can get a rare wallpaper showing a glimpse of how they live!

name: Shape Shuffle: A Shape Saga
description: Crafted for gamers of all ages, Shape Shuffle is a fun, addictive & educational puzzle game. Play it now and get taken on a visual adventure featuring puzzles made from shapes of all different colors and sizes.

name: Niaki
description:
There is a new Game in Town!
Niaki is a simple addictive game with an unique gameplay!
Try to regroup every color on the board but remember: A group can be formed only if it is bigger than the one destroyed.

name: The Lord of War
description:
Trade arms to build your own empire
You begin your arms dealer career having only small boat and a pair of warehouses. And then everything is started. Some suspicious guys send you an offer: "Bring us several containers with weapons and you will get very good money". Now, it depends only on you. Be arms dealer, own huge flotilla of ships and planes and go into big politics by supporting local gangs and clans with your weapons.

name: The Commander of Steel
description: The Commander of Steel is strategy game to come to iOS. Can you lead your army on a military operation and make enemies get down on their knees? It's time to find out.

name: Damn Little Town
description: Damn Little Town is a tactical board game for 1-4 players. The game is divided into two phases.

name: Football Hero
description:
This game is a brand new football game.
Become The player quarterback, Become The runningback!

name: Rocks Rider
description: Know that feeling? Put earplugs in, shake them with the rock, start the bike, and with the roaring engine accomplish the impossible. That’s the new Rock(s) Rider. Show them what you’ve got and reach the finish line despite the various obstacles, junk, and pitfalls. Let's rock and ride!

name: 4 Colours
description: Colour the "globe" and respect one basic rule: neighbouring areas should have different colours.

name: 7Days: Backer
description:
Are you bored of the same old novels? Are you interested in interactive story games, visual novel, choice based storyline, and indie games, but you're tired of the same old? Try our Adventure Game, a Mysterious Novel where choices do matter! We are offering our interactive storytelling game named ‘7Days: Mystery Visual Novel, Adventure Game’. All our stories, mysterious novels are written by diligently selected authors.
Here we come a story game, filled with mystery, touching, innocent episodes, storyline and chat stories!
'7Days!: Mystery Visual Novel, Adventure Game' is an amazing mystery story game and choice based game. It is a unique choice based, storytelling game where the user can create their unique story based on the choices they make.

name: Bloomyth & Strong Moon Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Labyrinth
description: Sin descripción

name: Bloomverse
description: Bloomverse is a Smart game where players can own characters and items and earn Bloomie tokens on the Solana network. The game features virtual lobbies, malls, and arenas where players can partake in different events and socialize. The game is available on browsers and mobile platforms.

name: Zombie Survivor: Undead City Attack
description: Welcome to Zombie Survivor: Undead City Attack - prepare to survive zombie outbreak in this FPS shooter game!

name: Pleasure Party 2
description: Create Wild Themed Sex Parties in Exotic Locations around the world in Pleasure Party 2, a "Sandbox" style Orgy Simulation Game. Create up to 25 custom characters and arrange them in any of over 75 sexual positions to create and manage the Orgy of your dreams!

name: Together Again
description: Christopher has been a wreck since losing his wife and son to a car accident. He would stop at nothing and do anything to have them back together again. Now, he believes he has found a way to make it happen...

name: The Cosmic Wheel Sisterhood - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Robomania
description: Robomania is an Action-Adventure Puzzle game where you play as the robot that can control three other robots. Solve puzzles, hide, fight and escape from the surreal laboratory with help of other robot called Empress.

name: Diamond Rush
description: Diamond Rush is the simplest 3D game in which you have to overcome various traps and look for diamonds.

name: Narrenschiff
description: "Narrenschiff" is a psychological horror puzzle game. Players take on the role of an amnesiac man who awakens in a mysterious mental hospital. As they explore, they unravel a story involving their own origins and the conspiracy brewing within the walls of the mental institution.

name: Dewborne Dawn
description: In this new hand-drawn, story-rich metroidvania, explore the last haven of a dying world, and discover the purpose you play in saving it. Shape your own path, fight the all-consuming blight, and help bring hope back to the survivors. Take up the flames of dead gods, and stand firm in Dewborne Dawn!

name: Day_000
description: Today might suck, because you and your childhood friend, are the only things standing between humanity and it's extinction. Choose your Hero, Bonnie or Klyde, and experience the same story, but from two completely different perspectives, in this Third Person Action Adventure Game

name: Tasking
description: "Tasking" is an idle monster-hunting game. You will start as an archer and recruit your own team members, use gold coins to purchase powerful skills, challenge formidable bosses, and defeat them one by one, gradually conquering each continent.

name: DoubleWe
description: Your clone is hiding among the crowd! Can you hunt down your killer clone before you die? In this Tense FPS Deception game, experience true paranoia as you stab your friends in the back in multiplayer or unravel the horrifying story of how clones are created in singleplayer

name: Tozerath in Ruins
description: Tozerath in Ruins is a indie RPG game with Turn-Based combat. Is the style of pixel top down with the setting of medieval fantasy.

name: Chillax
description: Chillax is a megawad compiled by an anonymous author and noted for its extreme difficulty. Most, perhaps all of the maps are plagiarized from other WADs, with monsters liberally added in. The mapset is often played on ZDaemon servers and is meant for cooperative play, though some of its maps have also been speedrunned in single-player mode.

name: ThrowBomb
description: Throw Bomb is a basic entertainment of 80's PC. Select angle and force, fire the bomb.

name: Driving Speed Pro
description:
Race in high powered V8 muscle cars from classic era to modern day. Highly realistic physics, graphics, sound, car handling and performance set this game apart.
Compete in career mode where you can experience a real racing career. Start off with a small amount of virtual credits and purchase a car to enter into organized series events. Win virtual credits from races that can be used to purchase more cars, pay for repairs and performance upgrades. Build your way up to compete in elite series events.
Modify your car by purchasing upgrades for performance and see exactly how each type of upgrade specifically improves the power and torque of the engine on a dyno chart. Purchase upgraded transmissions for faster gear shifts. Purchase better tyres for increased grip and road handling. Purchase weight reduction for better handling. Purchase suspension setups that lower the car and improve the handling from a lower center of gravity.

name: HappyTruck: Fruit Express
description:
HappyTruck - Deliver fruits to the marketplace with your truck.
You will need to get from one place to another without dropping too much from your truck. You will get a precise number of pieces you carry and a precise number of pieces that is required. The more you bring, the more score you get.

name: Number Jump King
description:
This is a game in which a colored ball jumps to avoid colliding with balls that are multiples of 3.
The jump starts the moment the tap action ends.
I hope you get to the finish line safely.

name: Wipeout Dash
description: Wipeout Dash sees you racing to the finish line to get the best time against a mountain of obstacles that stand in your way. Physics makes Wipeout Dash an easy to learn, hard to master race that will have you replying loads of difficult levels over and over again! You can challenge your own records for each level and see how much better your times can get!

name: Tails Noir Preludes
description: Tails Noir Preludes is a post-noir narrative adventure with branching choices. It is an intertwined series of vignettes about change, circumstance, and consequence. Guide four characters through formative moments in their lives in a dystopian Vancouver inhabited by anthropomorphic animals.

name: Imagindar
description: Imagindar is an online PvP Arena game that you can enjoy with your friends for free! There are no predefined classes or heroes. In each match, you create your own class and play exactly how you want with complete freedom. How will you build your dynamic class and outsmart your opponents?

name: Get Them Boats: Orca Revenge
description: You are an orca, a killer whale, out for revenge against the elites mucking up your waters. Attack the rudders, and eat the rich!

name: Elestrals
description:
A game of monsters, magic, and mythology! You have been chosen as a champion of the Gods, blessed with the ability to bond with the mythical Elestrals.

Together with your companions, learn to cast powerful spells using elemental spirits in your fight for the honor of the Pantheon! As a chosen moral, you'll need to be both courageous and cunning to claim victory and attain immortality.

name: Pokémon Volt White 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Cursor Thief
description: A small Flash game where the player must keep their cursor away from a man who desperately wants it. He'll climb along the border of the game, leap across the screen, shoot rockets and more all in an attempt to steal or destroy the cursor.

name: Fable Forts!
description: Fable Forts! Defend your fairy kingdom from stupid human invaders!

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing 2023 - Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Spreading
description:
Dead Spreading is an idle game based on the dead,come with us to resist deads!
Search the camp to save survivors,recruit soldiers to resist mad attack of the dead!
Reasonably arrange soldiers to defense and collect supplies,fight and produce at same time to maximize your profit!

name: JetTurbo
description: JetTurbo is a Hoverboard racing game made by fans of the Hoverboard racing genre. Ride, Perform Tricks, and Become the embodiment of Speed for thrill and glory in this Sci-Fi rush!

name: Ocean Scramble: Age of Exploration
description: Nautical simulation game with sail battleship piloted in third-person perspective.

name: Sky Hex
description: Sky Hex is a magnetic logic game that will brighten up your free time!

name: Raccoon Squad
description:
A game about raccoons.
Sneak into people's houses and steal food, furniture and everything else!
Get away with the goods and fill the raccoon dumpster!
Watch out for the guards trying to catch you!

name: Admiral: Battle for Uranium
description:
Prepare your nukes, and obliterate your opponents with an apocalyptic thermonuclear barrage, but get it wrong and their devastating counter attack will bring you to your knees! S.M presents its second title, Admiral, a stunning simulation of global thermonuclear war.

You play the role of a military general hidden deep within an Underwater bunker. Your mission - to successfully exterminate your enemy's civilian population whilst disabling their ability to attack your own. Start by launching your subs and bombers in order to control the last nuclear resources of the world and increase your credits...

Stark and foreboding, it feels like you’re at the centre of the Cold War even before a nuke has been fired.Refreshingly simple yet bursting with depth, Admiral is enjoyable as both a quick blast as well as subtle strategic epic.

name: Endless Rush
description:
Zoom through the trees as an adorable, furry, six-winged dynamo in ENDLESS RUSH!
Fly through the endless forest of Cerulean collecting nectar and boosts to compete for the fastest Rush in the canopy! Can you collect more, and go farther and faster than your friends!?

name: Newspaper Toss: Paperboy Edition
description:
In Newspaper Toss you need to throw newspapers filled with dynamite into houses and windows to cause explosive fun. Break all the windows and create combos, collect coins or avoid the obstacles. Several game styles to play and over 100 objectives to complete. You can then use your accumulated coins to upgrade your bike or obtain special items to use in the game.

The game features a huge map with additional options to collect even more coins! And lookout for further expansions of the map in future game updates. And for an extra challenge try to collect all stars in every level.

name: Pinball Tristan
description: Now you can enjoy the worldwide best selling, award winning Pinball Tristan in retro 3D! You'll love the precise, authentic ball movement and two challenging play modes. Suitable for all ages to play for hours and hours.

name: Yebushou: Defeat Pirates
description: In the 16th century, a large number of Japanese pirates appeared in the coastal areas of China, and a Chinese general was born. He led his troops to victory with very low battle damage, but when he first took office, the army was not capable of fighting, and only you two could save the early war.

name: Bahamut2-Come on, Fight
description: Roguelike combat mode, every battle is a new start, choose your favorite transfer route, learn new skills, face different enemies, and challenge the invincible devil. Bahamut 2-Bride of the Dragon parallel time and space, what different stories will there be?

name: Stunt Car Challenge 3
description:
Stunt Car Challenge has returned in real 3D with easy to learn controls and mechanics.
Perform amazing stunts with a stunt car! Drive on tracks with jumps and obstacles! Race against a train! Beat the cops in San Francisco! Start playing the fun tracks right now, and challenge yourself to get three stars from all levels!
Complete the Arizona levels, and open San Francisco city and port levels! Beware of the trolley cars and cops in San Francisco though.

name: Parking Mania 2
description:
A sequel for a popular Parking Mania in 3D.
Drive and park various cars completing exciting missions.

name: Stunt Wheels
description:
Yes! The Magnificent Stunts are back and this time they're racing around the backlots and studios of Stuntwood.
Battle to destroy your dastardly stunt rivals; Stunt Guy, Stunt Gail, Mucus, Danger-Susan and Nurse Long... and watch out for oil slicks, TNT and squirrels as you race masses of different cars through beached pirate ships, backflip over huge canyons, barrel-roll through rings of fire and smash your way through the competition with the crazy power ups including: - purple-hot Laser Wang, crushing Monsta Mode, tommy-gun wielding Mob Mode and the almost useless Mole Mode!

name: Eden Isle: Resort Paradise
description: Create your very own resort in this award-winning game with glowing praise from reviewers and players! Attract different guest types, keep your guests happy, manage your resort and work towards a five star rating!

name: Beasts & Monsters
description: This game is an extremely addictive pixel art adventure game. No more walking around outside in the cold. Now you can catch all your favourite beasts and monsters without even leaving your livingroom. Stay alive for as long as you can to reach the top of the leaderboard! Collect coins to unlock more wizards, spell books, magical wands and more. Try to always maintain full energy for the special super wizard attack. Fight to free the Pixel Kingdom from the pesky Beasts and Monsters!

name: Discarded Memories: Mysteries of the Past
description: Andrew Connor always knew that there was more to the story of the death of his fiance. Now, on the accident's 10 year anniversary, he decides that he's going to get the answers he knows are out there, no matter what. Explore the clues to discover the answers that nobody thought would be found.

name: Gas Station Tycoon
description: Build a gas station from zero to become the best gas station business empire in the world!

name: 52Beatup
description: 52Beatup is a Deck-Building, Fast-Paced (Like Really Fast-Paced), Fighting Game! Enjoy Chaotic and Quick matches with friend or foe!

name: Arcana Noir
description: Arcana Noir is an illustrated text-based Rogue-lite RPG using a D100 system, resource management, and decision trees inspired by adventure games and interactive fiction.

name: Short Warp: Deep Space Bounty
description: A new take on the classic arcade shoot 'em up, Short Warp: Deep Space Bounty combines top-down and side-scrolling action with gorgeous 3D graphics and modern features. Pick up and play multiple game modes. Choose from stock ship designs, or immerse yourself in component stats and custom builds!

name: Magical Girl Konoha
description: To aid the King, Priestess Konoha plunges into "Grimoire"! The world inside "Grimoire" is formed by another world called Grimoire Land in which Konoha becomes a magical girl, and has come to save the world!

name: BeZombie Anime Invasion
description: Dare to survive in BeZombie Anime Invasion! Navigate a monstrous city as a transformed heroine, recover lost memories, and unravel your past. Thrilling battles and a compelling story await, all in vibrant anime style. Do you have the courage to face your past and challenge fate? Start journey now!

name: Star Wars: Rogue Leaders - Rogue Squadron Wii
description: Star Wars: Rogue Leaders - Rogue Squadron Wii is a cancelled compilation game for the Nintendo Wii by Factor 5. The game was set to have Star Wars: Rogue Squadron, Star Wars: Rogue Squadron II - Rogue Leader, and Star Wars: Rogue Squadron III - Rebel Strike. It was cancelled in 2008 after Factor 5 went out of business because of the 2007-2008 financial crisis.

name: A Journey Together
description: Sin descripción

name: Burasagatte Iru Kiji
description: Burasagatte Iru Kiji is a game where you are a ninja with a hook, do not allow enemies to go unpunished.

name: Game & Watch-e: Flagman
description: A cancelled port of Flagman for the e-Reader. The existence of this port is only attested due to being mentioned on a magazine advert.

name: Game & Watch-e: Helmet
description: A cancelled port of Helmet for the e-Reader. The existence of this port is only attested due to being mentioned on a magazine advert.

name: Boyscout: Patrick's Town
description: Boyscout is a top-down adventure in which you play as Patricio, a little boy who is learning to help his neighbors while his father is trying to grow his own business in a rural town. One day, an unusual event will change the lives of the locals forever.

name: Arinn
description: Arinn is a precision platform game with dungeons full of enemies and deadly traps. The only way out is to escape from the enemies and overcome all the challenges. Collect all the treasures and help Arinn pay off his debts.

name: Goblin Survivors
description: Goblin Survivors - casual goblin destruction simulator with roguelike elements. Pump up destructive magic, erase hundreds of vile monsters, survive in battles with bosses! Make up your set of spells before foray into the lands of the enemy, for the most effective extermination!

name: Legendary Slide
description: In "Legendary Slide" you have to clear away the mahjong tiles by sliding them next to matching ones. Solve unique and mind bending puzzles and collect gems to restore ancient temple of Air. Continue your journey through the Legendary world! This is the Platinum Edition with unique extra content!

name: Light of Veilendor
description: A story-driven, fantasy game set in a dark and gloomy world filled with danger and opportunity. As the last survivor of the mighty crystal wolves, you must embark on an epic adventure to overthrow an ancient evil and rekindle the light of Veilendor.

name: Ardent Passions
description: Ardent Passions is an adult visual novel where Heroman uncovers his girlfriend and her friends' vigilante secrets on a camping trip. With the fate of these relationships at stake, the game unfolds through decisions that determine if these vigilantes become allies or enemies.

name: Uncensor Quest
description: You are assigned to the special cybersquad unit to deal with a mysterious threat which has begun censoring every piece of erotica it finds online. use your strategy to avoid or destroy the enemies and remove the censorship to complete each level.

name: Risky Sanctuary
description: Create, customize, and manage a vibrant sex club filled with adorable anthropomorphic characters. Watch the party unfold, while you install adult devices, navigate finances, protect your reputation, and manage a team of dedicated employees.

name: Infinite Realms
description: Discover a blend of 4X Strategy, Deckbuilding, and Roguelite! Find cards and customize them with runes, summon creatures, cast spells, terraform the world and push back Morrigan's Corruption!

name: Black Otaku 2: Taekwondo is in my Blood
description: Join Sahara B. Shabazz as she honours that Korean man's sacrifice by winning this martial arts tournament with the Taekwondo that flows in her veins.

name: Cracked
description: "Cracked" is a wild 2D combat racing game where manic eggs compete for egg supremacy. Choose wacky egg characters, navigate treacherous tracks with saws, spikes, lasers, and lava pits, and race to the sizzling frying pan finish line. Collect hilarious power-ups and pave your way to victory.

name: Ellan: The Lost Soul
description: Ellan is a beautiful first-person adventure game about the journey beyond life, Traveling with a light companion in dream-like worlds, and uncovering the meaning of eternal by overcoming the illusion of choice to light the path to Moksha.

name: Pim: The Forgotten
description: In this wonderful and colorful world, play as Pim, a fearful red panda able to wield the elements. Solve puzzles, support great heroes and discover the origin of the world in this Action and Adventure 3D game!

name: Plebs
description: Plebs is a casual real time strategy game about controlling ancient Nations to victory through strategic town building, creating mighty and diverse armies, and intelligent resource management.

name: Paper Planes Plus
description: A Stylish Hyper Frantic fun shmup, arcade experience! Engage enemies in one of 7 Paper styled aircrafts. 4 Chapters to JET through. Dogfight specialized enemy pilots.

name: Wyred
description: You play as a little robot looking after a lonely outpost on a distant planet. In each puzzle, your goal is to find a way to the other (or one of several) connectors while laying down a wire as you go. But be careful; you cannot cross over the wire you have laid, lest you break it!

name: Giant Robot Game
description: Play as a giant battle robot that's saving humanity from other giant robots. Fire from cannons, lob grenades, start wildfires, construct turrets, utilize the terrain, hack into enemy robots, make them overheat and explode, equip their legs, rescue humans, run away.

name: Wiki's Wild Ride
description: A birthright denied. An alliance forged. A plan hatched. The Jerks have locked away your dinners deep in the depths of the basement! Now you must ride your trusty steed through the house and reclaim what's rightfully yours!

name: SCP: Contamination
description: A bodycam footage game based on a member of D-class personnel who has awoken during a facility-wide contamination lockdown, you must escape the facility by navigating through the labs, basement areas & SCP classes that now roam free.

name: Raider: Dark Age
description: Raider: Dark Age is a hardcore PvPvE extraction looter set in a brutal medieval world. Survive horrific beasts and cut-throat bandits while battling to bring home mythical treasure with your friends.

name: Upon the Eldritch Planet
description: Upon the Eldritch Planet is a sci-fi FPS + Survival-lite + Rougelike. Journey through a unforgiving planet filled with lush environments and dangerous enemies. Equip yourself with a unique RPG build to find your way through each run. Can you survive Upon the Eldritch Planet?

name: Asmodeus
description: Asmodeus is a management adventure game set in a 2.5D side-scrolling world. Collect resources and fight monsters, upgrade your village and defend it against outside threats. Thrive your village with a great commander mind and show your fighting skills during boss fights.

name: League TD
description: "League TD" is a strategy tower defense game that combines unique defense towers and various upgradeable components to unleash different attack effects. Come and build your perfect defense line.

name: Abrupt Valley
description: Welcome to Abrupt Valley, a competitive 1v1 city building/auto battler game. Create your city, upgrade your buildings, prepare you army and watch it fight your enemies. Optimize your city, adapt to your opponent and climb the ladder!

name: Kandyland
description: Kandyland is a single player horror game in which you must outwit beloved characters that once brought you joy, in order to escape the park.

name: Atrion Project
description: Atrion project is a sci-fi platformer game, in wich you play an hybrid made in a laboratory. Collect the pieces of your crashed ship to reveal your true identity and accomplish your mission. Use your cybernetic weapons to fight unique alien creatures in varied and original environments.

name: PartySaur: Dino Mayhem
description: PartySaur: Dino Mayhem is a casual 1 - 4 player local multiplayer action game where players battle each other in a variety of mini-games set in a prehistoric environment. Defeat your rivals and become the PartySaur champion.

name: Balloo's Mall
description: Balloo's Mall - single-player horror game created by indie developer. Complete the puzzles and tasks to find out your friend who worked in the mall.

name: Azorius
description: Explore the world, get resources, go through dungeons, solve puzzles, fight monsters, use magic, craft items, build a settlement and recruit residents!

name: Rome Frontiers
description: A realistic rome builder simulator will allow you build the most important architectural works of ancient Rome. Are you ready to face the challenges as a builder of ancient Rome?

name: Grey Lines
description: "Grey Lines" is a third person action conspiracy game. Play as Anna, a CIA agent, John, a detective, or Vic, a Navy Seal. Each has a specific set of tools and skills. Engage in stealth ops, investigations, and combat. Your choices shape your story. Navigate the grey lines and the stop global threat.

name: The Legend of Tiny Man
description: A story about a dark fairy tale where you need to save a small kingdom from two evils.

name: Journey Beyond the Edge of the World
description: An atmospheric first-person adventure game set on a storm-torn fishing ship. Solve puzzles to unfold a mysterious and surreal story – told in a unique way through narrated ambient music. An audiovisual experience with pixelated graphics and immersive spatial audio that works on regular headphones.

name: Aconite
description:
Momo is the most positive boy you'll ever meet in this world!

He's a middle-schooler, and his dream is to be friends with everyone in his class (and eventually with the whole school!)

Momo approaches the new days and new people with a smile and endless optimism. But it turns out that it's not enough to make friends with everyone. Especially when your longtime friend has moved to your school and doesn't like your new friends...

Aconite is a game about friendship, sincerity, and trust. It's about how the world is a much more complicated place than you thought.

And how okay it is not to be happy all the time.

name: Humans & Vampires
description: Humans & Vampires is a cooperative tower defense game for 1-8 players set in a dark medieval fantasy age, where an eternal conflict between humans and vampires lives. Manage your base, defend it with towers and upgrade buildings to defeat your enemies and survive.

name: The Void
description: Join the quest to overtake the void and become a hero! In this game, you will slay your enemies in a point and click fashion and overtake the void for good, or so you think... Join the quest in taking over the void to find out!

name: MTBF
description: MTBF is a VR Multiplayer Parkour Arena Shooter. Hone your skills and master your surroundings to outrun, out-shoot, and outsmart your opponents in fast-paced back-to-back matches alone or with friends. If you can't make it to the top, just try and stay away from the bottom. Good luck.

name: Gloggy
description: Collect glorbs by clearing ores in the glowfields with your limitless power of deduction - and a bit of help from detectors and extractors. Stay away from the ghosts or risk becoming one yourself. Rise through the ranks of miners to become the true Overglord, and use special traps and skills to win!

name: Ice Cold Case
description: An indie detective RPG inspired by titans such as Fallout: New Vegas and Disco Elysium. Talk to the residents, explore the neighbourhood, solve crimes, and dive into the world of the city of Bayview in 3D voxel glory!

name: Fruit Slash
description: In order to bind the maids, the devil scattered their souls and haunted them. Now, they need your help to defeat the demons, reunite the soul fragments, and free them.

name: Territorial Hissing
description: Territorial Hissing is a 2D sidescroller adventure about bringing down a corrupt corporation in an otherwise bright and colorful land. Something smells fishy. Save your home in this comedy adventure!

name: Drongo's Festive Adventures
description: Hop the seasons. Collect pickups, conquer themed levels inspired by Christmas, Halloween, Zen Garden, and Easter, and enjoy breathtaking graphics with ray tracing. Unlock each level as you progress, compete on leaderboards, and experience the joy of platforming in this immersive holiday-themed game!

name: We Escaped a Twisted Game
description: We Escaped a Twisted Game is a two-player online co-op escape room. Trapped in a haunted manor, you’ll rely on teamwork to progress the challenges, face the horrors and ultimately escape together. But can you trust each other?

name: Artificia Armata
description: A classic tower defense game placed in a dystopic era where humanity is threatened by the machines that they built to protect themselves.

name: Emery
description: Emery is a feature rich, fast paced and gameplay focused 2D platformer! Players are able to create their very own Emery class charge bot, and explore mysterious worlds in their search to find and recharge other lost bots!

name: Up to the Unknown
description: Step into a delightful 2D pixel platformer adventure! Explore a mysterious world with a dark world, an invisible cave zone, and so much more. Use simple controls to get past those scary traps. Enjoy charming pixel art and an enchanting soundtrack. Get ready for an unforgettable journey!

name: The Sacrificial Girl of the Fantasy 3: Kingdoms 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Twistingo: Turtle Bay - Collector's Edition
description: Play a variety of puzzles and games, including clever blends of hidden objects, bingo, and marble-popping. Are you up to the challenge?

name: Silly Frog
description: Embark on an enchanting journey with Silly Frog. Overcome obstacles in a beautiful swan's introspective realm to win her heart and understand her better.

name: Rocketman
description: As Ranger Ross, also known as the Rocketman, you are tasked to reclaim the corporate colonies of Sommerkrit. In this ultimate top-down shooter battle utilize your arsenal of weapons, summon your clucks, and support your allies to break through the enemy lines.

name: Demon Mage
description: Demon Mage is an action-platformer shooter. Levitate between platforms to strike down enemy Mages with a variety of upgradeable spells. Explore the lairs of each guild with secrets to find in every level.

name: Offroad Survival
description: Survive a journey of a lifetime... if you can! Choose the best roads to reach your destination. Drive across difficult terrain. Obtain essential resources in any way you can. Solve a mystery and avoid a grim fate as you face unexpected challenges that cut you off from the rest of the world.

name: Invisible X
description: We control a taxi driver through New York City's Street in October 1938. We are Paul River who will live an adventure which change our minds. We visit New York places such as 57th West Street with old stetic graphics as tribute for PS1 3d-Games. "The world doesn't know it but we are in danger."

name: Line Link
description: Line Link is a logical puzzle game, perfect for relaxing or while your computer is loading another game.

name: The Echo Whispers
description: The Echo Whispers is a psychological horror experience that takes you to the shattering of expectations and a surprising outcome. In this game, you are Amy and you are alone with yourself, which is much scarier than being alone without you.

name: Puppets' Dream TD
description: On the night I saved the world, I died. A tower defense game in which the main character travels through the world after his death. Collect characters and items, organize your party, and find out the mysteries hidden in the world.

name: Eldrimar: The Card Game
description: Eldrimar: The Card Game is a card-based roguelike where you take on the role of the warlord Saron and participate in all significant battles for the kingdom of Eldrimar.

name: Spellslinger
description: Spellslinger is a Strategy RPG Word Game. Spell words from a 4x4 tile grid to defeat enemies. Use strategic synergies of Spells and Artefacts to exploit weaknesses and defeat even the most powerful of foes. Explore a world with multiple unique areas on your quest to defeat The Dark One.

name: World War 2: WW2 Strategy Games
description: A World War II themed turn-based war chess game. You will play a commander during World War II, directing your troops to complete various tasks. You have the opportunity to reproduce every historical battle, command the ace generals and elite troops in history to win the victory!

name: The Farming Frontier
description: The Farming Frontier is a tranquil wilderness RPG, that delivers a farming simulation. Within this realm, you can cultivate crops, cut wood, catch fish, mine, and build amid wild landscapes. Reclaim your village, and confront adversaries in this tranquil wilderness RPG.

name: Five Days of Hell
description: A survival game in which you have to explore a desert canyon, face anomalies and various monsters.

name: Spy Cats
description: A 2D platforming adventure where you play as a cat on a mission to find hidden secrets as part of the Spy Cats Agency. Use gadgets to sneak through each mission, retrieve the artifact, and make a successful escape.

name: Cleric and Goblins
description: "Cleric and Goblins" is a VR action game where you rescue a Cleric from a dungeon filled with goblins. The procedurally generated dungeons offer infinite adventures, while the physics-based combat system provides engaging battles.

name: The Endgame
description: True sandbox hack'n'slash entirely focused on endgame. Slay hordes of monsters in the most spectacular way and with extreme speed. Collect countless items, materials or cosmetics and take part in living economy.

name: Frame of Mind: A game of Thoughts
description: Frame of Mind is a brief and cozy narrative game that lets you discover a character trough thoughts and mementos they find while moving out of their parents home. It's an introspective game, meant to share some experiences a peer-group of neurodivergent queers, including the developer, had growing up.

name: Motel Simulator: Create, Renovate & Grow Business
description: Motel Simulator is a game that allows you to become the manager of your own motel! Decorate the interior, rent out rooms, expand, and collect profits. Develop marketing strategies to attract diverse guests. Fulfill their requests and offer various services to keep your motel successful and popular.

name: Chaos Pattern
description: Chaos Pattern is an Action/Strategy hybrid game, with a visual blend of modern lighting and retro looks.

name: Plunged
description: Plunged is a casual, first-person single-player 3D-Platformer where you use your plunger and rope to climb to the top.

name: Blessed Burden
description: A horror adventure with platforming elements in which you play the last surviving priest in a religious apocalypse.

name: RoadPipe
description: Rotate, Connect, Help the car reach its destination! Explore the minimalistic stage with various gimmicks.

name: Revenguard
description: Evil creatures took your dog! They have taken over the kingdom and are threatening all the inhabitants. Can you pass the obstacles, uncover all the secrets and save them?

name: Kinlings
description: Craft your tale in a whimsical fantasy world. Shape a charming city, fulfill Kinlings' needs, and watch their unique stories unfold. Explore, quest, farm, and build. Experience the enchantment of Kinlings.

name: Botsu: Ridiculous Robots
description: Fight your friends in hilarious sandbox sports: Boxball, Sumo Survival, and Stockpile. Wrestle your way to victory online or split-screen in unique matches. Unlock outrageous outfits and pull off awesome moves to flex your skills!

name: Kero
description: Kero is a third person collecting frog game where the player can explore the Rana archipelago, where tons of frogs live and participate in the KeroFest, a big hunt contest !

name: Star Armada
description: Embark on a thrilling spaceship auto-battler adventure in Star Armada a strategic space combat game where you build, customize, and command your ultimate fleet of capital spaceships, unlocking new upgrades and abilities to help you survive against your enemies.

name: Hero's Journey
description: Hero's Journey is a low poly style light rogue game. Players play the role of medieval warriors, defeat monsters and survive!

name: Geode Climb
description: Control the Geode Climbers born in the underground and aim for the surface in this jumping action game. You can only jump. Control the direction and strength to climb up.

name: Revenge of Chickens
description: Play as a rooster that wants to get revenge from humans and try to rescue chickens!

name: Frontier of Madness
description: Join forces with friends in a thrilling multiplayer survival experience. Battle nightmarish creatures, construct resilient camps, and unravel the mysteries of a twisted world. But tread carefully, as the encroaching darkness tests your sanity. Will you survive together or succumb to madness?

name: Landraisers
description: Explore the seas, loot islands, and slay bosses - all in the name of creating your own dream island!

name: The North Woods
description: The North Woods is a single player horror game in which you take on the role of a police officer, responding to a call, all the while looking through the view of his bodycam.

name: Bridge Crossing
description: In a troubled period of war, help the shepherd to cross the bridge in search of the lost sheep.

name: Neural Construct
description: Neural Construct is a free, online, educational and a chaotic party game in which you design and construct your own neural network to compete with other players and score points. Quickly adapt and overcome any obstacle to win.

name: Arcade FC
description: Arcade FC is an arcade soccer game with skill-based gameplay, fast-paced graphics, responsive controls, accurate ball physics and that retro vibe.

name: Half Sword
description: Half Sword is a physics-based medieval combat simulator featuring historically accurate XV-century arms and armor.

name: Wine and Spirits
description: Become a legendary bartender on a mystical train traversing battlefields across time, crafting extraordinary cocktails for fallen warriors. Explore exotic locations, mix unique ingredients, and embark on an immersive, dialogue-and-puzzle-based adventure in "Wine and Spirits."

name: Dead Underworld
description: Embark on a dangerous odyssey through the Dead Underworld. Unleash potent weapons and unearth artifacts to conquer this unforgiving dungeon diving roguelike. Ally with others, forging bonds or exploiting friendships, or gain power among factions to survive in this desolated realm.

name: Hitchhike Wars
description: Hitchhike Wars is an adrenaline-fueled shooter game that combines high-speed hitchhiking, intense car combat and strategic weapon upgrades. Players embark on a thrilling journey, racing against time to hitch rides, unlock powerful weapons, and engage in PvP battles with other hitchhikers on the road.

name: Astral Rot
description: Astral Rot is a fixed camera, survival horror sci-fi game by the co-creators of Tormented Souls. You play as Adler, a space mining engineer, that will have to face impossible choices in order to save his brother and anyone in the asteroid that hasn't been infected by the Stardust Disease.

name: Bullets & Brains
description: Bullets and Brains is an adrenaline-pumping arcade top-down 3D shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by brain-hungry hordes of zombies. Prepare yourself for an intense battle against the never-ending onslaught of the undead.

name: Record of Agarest War: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: A Space for the Unbound: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Kickin Kong
description:
Get your Monkey on!
Help Kong kick through 10 whacky levels, encountering many bizarre characters, hazards & challenges along the way.
In this annoyingly addictive casual 3D game, keepie uppies may seem simple, but when the cute critters & bombs start dropping the pressure can just get too much for some people…

name: Football Maestro
description:
A simple, highly tactical football manager game to rival the best phone games currently on the market. Create your own club and play against real users from across the world, in live, real time matches to see who can achieve the glory!
Play in up to 4 different competitions against real users in seasons which last a week.
As well as a world ranking game mode to see who's the weekly Creme de la Creme of Football Maestro.

name: Hidden Object: Travel to Future - Ancient Portals
description:
Hidden Object: Travel to Future - Ancient Portals
Victoria stumbles upon a time portal while visiting her late uncle's house. She excitedly uses it and causes a temporal clash. The future and past start to meld together to create a time paradox. The fate of humanity hangs in the balance and only Victoria can stop it! Travel to victorians France, ancient India and visit the mysterious Mayans to correct the time paradox and save the world in this engaging hidden object puzzle adventure.

name: My Little Garden
description:
Plant, water and fertilize the plants, help them flourish and make them happy.
Use garden tools, summon supernatural rains, warm sunrays or magical smoke.

name: Color Teaser
description:
Color Teaser is a fast paced mind bending brain teasing game that will tease, confuse and possibly make you rage.
How many of you know that your right-brain tries to say the colour but your left-brain insist to say the word. That is right, with Color Teaser, we like you to experiment yourself and find out how good you are with responding to both side of your brains signal.
In a very short time you will have to choose the answer based on the color of the text and not based on what is written. We warn you that if you choose the incorrect answer at any level then you will have to start all over again from level 1.

name: Colorim
description:
So simple, yet addictive...
Colorim is the second game in our color series, after Coloround...
Colorim is all about a rim sliced into colors. There is an arrow in the middle with a dot on it's tail. Simply tap the screen to throw that dot to where the arrow points. Do your best to shoot the matching color in the rim but beware of the black dots in between because you should avoid hitting them.
It may sound and look easy at the beginning, but beware all the bits and tricks you'll encounter on each upcoming level...

name: Flown
description:
Flown is a highly original game, Tap and tilt your way to the top in this simple, fun game, with 36 of the craziest characters to collect,
especially number 7!
Help the Early Bird find his friends on a quest that will take you deep under the sea to the farthest reaches of outer space! Flap your wings through 6 different worlds enlisting the help of all the pets and wild creatures you find along the way!

Is your vision 20/20?
If You score below 20 you FAIL.

name: Battle Slugs
description:
Playing Battle Slugs, you take command of a well-trained army of the finest slugs, either green angelic slugs or red devilish slugs (you can decide which, based on what you did last night).
Slug it out across a variety of hexagon-celled playing fields, each with its own sweet spots and bottlenecks, using strategy to claim the most territory and conquer the field. The game includes colorful cartoony graphics, plus changing backgrounds and custom soundtrack music.
Your progress is saved and sent to the Game Center high scores list.
Take on a friend or go up against the cold logic of the CPU on one of three levels of difficulty.

name: BrainTaire
description:
There is no way to find most talented person in the world! One thing that Google can not help you search!
It will be interesting to find most talented person by country/year/city/schools.
Only the most talented person in the world will be able to beat all 6 levels of this game! Is that you?

name: Mystery Crypt
description: Mystery Crypt is a brand new Halloween game that involves scares and logic. The mind game is arranged in a sort of puzzle that gets your brain working without getting bored. The action takes place on a graveyard, filled with tons of white bones on a dark Halloween night. The bones were left from previous players who did not have enough brains to win the game. Your job, as a player, is to save the unfortunate souls and bring the dead players back to life by connecting their broken bones on the graveyard.

name: Shoot n Scroll 3D
description: Helicopter arcade game. Shoot'em-up action with plenty of sky adventures and adrenaline. The game is aimed at all gamblers, from novices to core action gamers. Gamblers can try their skills at lot of levels and bosses. As they complete levels, gamblers gain access to new, more powerful armed enemies and unexpected air attack surprises. Easy game controls, arcade action and lot of guns, bullets, rockets and explosions. Ready for takeoff? Wheels up!

name: Snake Quest
description:
Snake Quest is a version of the classic snake game which is extremely popular. The game runs in beautiful full screen in clear definition on the iPad. There are puzzle games, race against time features, endless random levels, and more! The main goal is to get all the jewels in a level, but beware of running into yourself, spikes or fire walls.
The app includes over 45 unique, vastly challenging levels in four worlds that bat an eyelash or two to popular culture while engaging players with diverse challenges. Not satisfied with these levels? Don’t sweat it, Snake Quest includes 190 additional levels in eight worlds that you can access via in-app purchase whenever you want.

name: Snappy Elf
description:
Help Santa collect gifts!
The Elves are misbehaving and up to mischief! They have a few pranks up their sleeves for Santa!
How many gifts can you collect?
Merry Christmas and enjoy!

name: Tapgym
description:
Are you ready, bro? Let’s get tapping!
We live for the gym, but what do we do when we’re not at the gym? We #tapgym!
Smash through push ups, lifts, lunges, sit ups, and so much more…
Do you have the muscle to reach #berserkmode and be the toughest bro alive?

name: Steal the Meal: Unblock Puzzle
description: Feed an insatiable red cat in Steal the Meal: Unblock Puzzle. Enjoy a new comic twist on classic snakes mechanics with cute characters and amuzing sounds. Help the spy mice filch strings of sausages, fish, ham and other yummy treats from the fridge. The less moves you make, the more stars you get. Collect stars to unlock new brain-teasing levels for free! Challenge your logic with a cheerful unblock game for all ages!

name: Stick Tennis Tour
description: Jet off to join the Stick Tennis Tour! Create your player and tour the world in the "definitive virtual tennis experience" (The Sun).

name: Who Is It?
description: How many famous people do you know? You say "Oh, I know a lot of them". Check it! The application is based on the painting "Discussing the Divine Comedy with Dante" by chinese artists Dai Dudu, Li Tiezi, and Zhang An. This extraordinary painting depicting 103 figures from world history in striking detail. If you can guess at least half of them it will be great result!

name: Doodlebug
description:
Doodlebug is back! almost 20 years on since this classic platform adventure first appeared commercially on Amiga and Atari ST.
Doodlebug offers twenty levels of varied platform action spread across five themed worlds. Interactive characters within the the game allow Doodlebug to buy submarines, buggies, dragons, helicopters and space ships to help him on his quest to rescue the lovely Princess Lady Bug.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted Plus
description: Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted + is a mod for FNAF Help Wanted, that aims to bring back cut features from the original Help Wanted, and add in completely new levels and characters!

name: The Isle Survival
description: The Isle Survival is a vast open world survival / crafting game. Loot resources, craft items, build camps and explore the environment. Protect yourself from hazards and wildlife. Find ways to survive in hostile living conditions.

name: Contra Spirits 64
description:
Contra Spirits 64 is a canceled entry in the Contra series that was being in development in 1998 by Konami Computer Entertainment Osaka and was planned to be released on the Nintendo 64.

The game was presumably going to be a side-scrolling platformer shoot 'em up in 2.5D, with the camera probably changing to a higher perspective in certain sections and boss battles.

Most likely due to poor sales of the Nintendo 64 in Japan, Konami ultimately decided to stop the project and disbanded the team, which then were assigned to work separately in different projects.

name: Super 20 in 1
description:
A bootleg cartridge released in Korea. It included NES games.

1. Spartan X (Kung Fu)
2. Super Mario Bros.
3. Antarctic Adventure
4. Twin Bee
5. Battle City
6. Circus Troupe
7. Galaga
8. Yie Ar Kung-Fu
9. Star Force
10. Road Fighter
11. Pinball
12. Bomberman
13. Tetris
14. Arkanoid
15. BallonFight
16. Donkey Kong
17. Gorilla 3 (Donkey Kong 3)
18. Donkey Kong Jr.
19. Mr. Mary (Mario Bros.)
20. Popeye

name: Sweet Halloween
description: Sin descripción

name: Horde Havoc
description: As a valiant warrior, your mission is to combat a relentless 2d battle against hordes of monstrous creatures. Can you withstand the Havoc and emerge victorious against the horde?

name: Stargazing
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Colonizers: The Sandbox
description: Sin descripción

name: League of War: Mercenaries
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzle Wars: Heroes
description: Sin descripción

name: Vexed Heroes
description: Welcome to Vexed Heroes! Fun fast paced survival bullet hell, unlock classes and create your own powerful builds and rage through endless new game plus!

name: Conrad's Quest
description: A 3D top down strategy game. Do u have what it takes to complete all these level and help Conrad. Only the best gamers will be able to complete the last level.

name: Monster Demolition
description: Sin descripción

name: Island King
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Survivor
description: Sin descripción

name: Water Power
description: Sin descripción

name: Archipelago Empire
description: Sin descripción

name: Fuzzys Quest 2
description: Its been 3 months since Fuzzy last defeated King Koodie and all seems quiet. Unbeknown to Fuzzy his dreams of a quiet life was all about to change. King Koodie is still out there, What could he be planning?

name: Pre Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Extreme Bus Driver 2024
description: Are you ready to become an experienced bus driver? Experience the thrill of transporting passengers in a realistic city with Extreme Bus Driver 2024! Get passengers to their destination on time and safely, earn rewards and customize your bus.

name: End Up Alone
description: In a dark world, in an empty place full of hidden secrets and parasites, you have to try to escape.

name: Fisher's Wharf
description: ️ Welcome to Fisher's Wharf! ️  Dive into the pixelated world of fishing fun!  Cast your virtual fishing rod and get ready for an epic adventure at the colorful Fisher's Wharf!

name: Dyin to Live
description: A contagious puzzle game where death is the only way to live! Use infectious abilities to expand your virus hive mind. But spread carefully, because each ability results in your host's death! Master your deadly skills so you can live another day.

name: When Twilight Strikes
description:
You are a bounty hunter.

Responsible for taking in rogue supernaturals, you work for IAOS—the international agency of supernaturals—where, alongside your best friend and partner, you two have quickly become the best hunting duo of the branch.

After a particularly tricky hunt, you brief your boss, Caine Atheron, and come back to work the next day to find that he has mysteriously disappeared overnight, the company is now in the hands of his best friend, Sebastian Mai.

And though no one else seems to question it, something tells you that there's more to the story.

With bounty cases rising at an alarming rate and a second mystery unfolding, you and your ragtag team of allies set out to find the truth.

But as you go further and further, the secrets you uncover begin to make you question: who... or what exactly are you fighting for?

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Amazing Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Kyou kara Tsukaeru Hisshou Business Shinrigaku
description: Sin descripción

name: Oku dake Study Hangul Kiso Tango
description: Sin descripción

name: Kashiri Kyoufu no Shashin
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción
